data.title: Events
data.meta_description: Browse the full calendar of upcoming cultural events, presentations and workshops at SCAD, with opportunities in Savannah, Atlanta, Hong Kong and Lacoste.
data.text:
Visit Savannah's most historic movie palace for a theater tour and demonstration of its original 1925 Wurlitzer theatre organ.

Join SCAD FASH for an exclusive tour of the university’s spectacular Atlanta location in the heart of Midtown.

Forrest Gump follows the captivating life of a gentle Southern man who is thrust into the tumultuous moments of the 20th century during a magical odyssey through American...

Experience the magic of silent cinema brought to life at the historic Lucas Theatre for the Arts with a special program of hilarious shorts.

Join SCAD faculty and alumni at SIGGRAPH 2024, the ultimate opportunity for those pursuing careers in computer arts, presented by the SCAD office for career and alumni success,...

Catch the 4K restoration of director Mike Nichols' Academy Award-winning masterpiece The Graduate, a film that has seduced audiences for nearly 60 years.

Enter the mythological world of Ancient Greece for a hilarious epic following one of its most renowned heroes: the mighty Hercules.

Join SCAD professor Amy Lennertz for an exploration of religious and mythical influences on design.

Calling all alumni eager to reinvigorate their verve for artful invention: Après SCAD is heading South.
